keywords: Planning and construction,Public,C,P,Committee and panel meetings,TfL
description: Agendas and minutes from the latest Projects & planning panel meetings

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["The Panel monitors the delivery of the TfL Investment Programme and considers the Integrated Assurance Reviews of projects that require project or procurement authorities from the Finance and Policy Committee or the Board. It also considers strategic planning issues and provides advice on project management and scrutiny."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
From 1 April 2014 the Projects and Planning panel ceased to exist. Its items of business were submitted to the Finance and Policy committee (now the Finance committee) .
Members: Isabel Dedring (Chair), Daniel Moylan (Vice Chair), Sir John Armitt, Roger Burnley, Baroness Grey-Thompson, Angela Knight
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"2014 meeting papers"}
